title: Nanoscopic Sentinel
text: A nanoscopic sentinel deployed in the megacity underbelly, finished in rust, brass, teal alloys. Noted for its featherweight and rapid systems.

image.style: illustration, sci-fi, centered subject, high detail
image.description: A nanoscopic sentinel within a megacity underbelly habitat, featherweight, rapid. The scene is illuminated by rust, brass, teal luminescence.
